problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following types of graded assignments appear in this course?|| Select all that apply.<< [ ] Quizzes [x] Practice [ ] Exams [x] Coursework [x] Peer-graded Essays
[explanation] This course does not have quizzes or exams, but it does use practice problems, coursework exercises, and peer-graded essays. [explanation]

choiceresponse.label: Which of the following types of graded assignments appear in this course?

div.p: This course does not have quizzes or exams, but it does use practice problems, coursework exercises, and peer-graded essays.
